public class PageRank
extends WikiGraph

Implements PageRank for a graph, as given by Brin and Page.

public void calculatePageRank(double alpha)
Re-calculates PageRank values using a non-default value of alpha.

Parameters:

pageRankDiff

protected static double pageRankDiff(double[] i,
                                     double[] j)
Calculates the absolute change between two PageRank value arrays.

Parameters:
i - Old PageRank array
j - New PageRank array
Returns:
Sum of the absolute value of the difference between all corresponding element pairs.
